alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 21 at 3:41AM MST until February 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 26 below zero. * WHERE...Yuma County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be sure to dress appropriately for the commute to work or school Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
